builtInAgentDesc: Use Cognia's built-in AI agent capabilities

settings.title: External Agents
settings.description: Configure external AI agents to extend Cognia's capabilities
settings.enableExternalAgentsDesc: Allow using external agents like Claude Code via ACP protocol

settings.showNotificationsDesc: Display notifications when agents connect or disconnect
settings.defaultPermissionModeDesc: Default permission mode for new agent sessions
settings.deleteAgentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this agent? This action cannot be undone.
settings.addAgentToStart: Add an agent to get started
settings.agentConfigDescription: Configure the external agent connection settings
settings.commandRequired: Command is required for stdio transport
settings.endpointRequired: Endpoint URL is required for HTTP transport
